Specimen Requirements:
Submit only 1 of the following:
 
Note: Source is required.
 
Bronchial Lavage/Bronchial Wash:
Collect 1 mL in a sterile container with a leak-proof cap.
Ship refrigerate.
 
Sputum:
Collect 1 mL in a sputum collection kit or a sterile, plastic container with
a leak-proof cap.
Ship refrigerate.
 
Throat or Nasopharyngeal Swab:
Collect in 3 mL M4 media or V-C-M medium (green-cap) tube or equivalent (UTM).
Ship refrigerate.
Reject Due To:
Specimens other than	Bronchial lavage, bronchial wash, sputum, nasopharyngeal swab, throat swab
Anticoagulants other than	NA
Hemolysis	NA
Thawing	Warm OK; Cold OK
Lipemia	NA
Icteric	NA
Reference Values:
Reference Range: Not detected
